project.description:
Teaching logic gates shouldn't be drawing arbitrary shapes on a whiteboard!

The logic gates are 3D, magnetic, and wired to perform as expected.

These logic gates are simple and fun to play with and spark creativity and investigative thought.

node.description: Electric Engine is my new project. Different from electric motor because it retains a cylinder and a piston similar to solenoid engine but its design requires minimal current and voltage but produce noticeable torque. My aim is to have a renewable, sustainable, and affordable clean energy beginning on household and then to industrial application.

project.description: Advance the Century-Old Stirliling Engine with todays technology. Electric Stirling Engine is smokeless, flameless. A Zero Emission External Combustion Engine for multiple application

project.description:
Smart charging indicator for your home. The device can display the charging status of your electric car, wherever you need it. It can even remind you to plug in.

The integrated plant fully offsets the CO2 needed to power the device. The PowerPlanter is part of "Sion Parts for Future".
project.title: Sion PowerPlanter

project.description: The Dronecoria Frame is an open source drone design for aerial sowing and ecosystem restoration. Together with the Seed Coating machine and Seed Sower, these tools can be used to reforest large tracks of land at a low cost bringing back the trees and habitats that support life on this planet.
project.title: Drone Frame
